entry.title: Euro area international trade in goods surplus €16.4 bn
entry.summary: The first estimates of euro area balance showed a €16.4 bn surplus in trade in goods with the rest of the world in November 2024, compared with + €18.2 bn in November 2023.

entry.title: Euro area international trade in goods surplus €6.8 bn
entry.summary: The first estimates of euro area balance showed a €6.8 bn surplus in trade in goods with the rest of the world in October 2024, compared with + €9.4 bn in October 2023.

entry.title: Euro area international trade in goods surplus €12.5 bn
entry.summary: The first estimates of euro area balance showed a €12.5 bn surplus in trade in goods with the rest of the world in September 2024, compared with + €9.8 bn in September 2023.

entry.title: Euro area international trade in goods surplus €4.6 bn
entry.summary: The first estimates of euro area balance showed a €4.6 bn surplus in trade in goods with the rest of the world in August 2024, compared with €4.8 bn in August 2023.

entry.title: Euro area international trade in goods surplus €21.2 bn
entry.summary: The first estimates of euro area balance showed a €21.2 bn surplus in trade in goods with the rest of the world in July 2024, compared with €6.7 bn in July 2023.

entry.title: Euro area international trade in goods surplus €22.3 bn
entry.summary: The first estimates of euro area balance showed a €22.3 bn surplus in trade in goods with the rest of the world in June 2024, compared with €18.0 bn in June 2023.

entry.title: Euro area international trade in goods surplus €13.9 bn
entry.summary: The first estimates of euro area balance showed a €13.9 bn surplus in trade in goods with the rest of the world in May 2024, compared with a deficit of €0.4 bn in May 2023.

entry.title: Euro area international trade in goods surplus €15.0 bn
entry.summary: The first estimates of euro area balance showed a €15.0 bn surplus in trade in goods with the rest of the world in April 2024, compared with a deficit of €11.1 bn in April 2023.

entry.title: Euro area international trade in goods surplus €24.1 bn
entry.summary: The first estimates of euro area balance showed a €24.1 bn surplus in trade in goods with the rest of the world in March 2024, compared with +€19.1 bn in March 2023.

entry.title: Euro area international trade in goods surplus €23.6 bn
entry.summary: The first estimates of euro area balance showed a €23.6 bn surplus in trade in goods with the rest of the world in February 2024, compared with +€3.6 bn in February 2023.

entry.title: Euro area international trade in goods surplus €11.4 bn
entry.summary: The first estimates of euro area showed a €11.4 bn surplus in trade in goods with the rest of the world in January 2024, compared with a deficit of €32.6 bn in January 2023.
